definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The physical and chemical properties of the carbon black are detected, and its microstructure is analysed by High Revolution Electromicroscopy (HREM) and X-ray Diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 射線衍射和高分辨率透射電鏡分析了樣品的微觀結構。

sentences.english: The experimental parameters of spectrograph for high resolution (HR) spectroscopy are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了高分辨率光譜實驗的光譜儀參數。

sentences.english: The theories of wavelet transform and multi-resolution analysis are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了小波變換和多分辨率分析理論。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a frequency direction-based multiresolution image fusion method.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於頻帶方向的多分辨率圖像融合方法。

sentences.english: This makes it possible to research the polarization in a ferroelectric substance by HRTEM.
sentences.chinese: 這是利用高分辨成像研究位移型鐵電體極化的基礎。

sentences.english: Take advantage of resource-processing tools that red UCe PNG resolution and color depth.
sentences.chinese: 利用資源處理工具減少PNG的分辨率和色深。

sentences.english: Composite connections are only low-resolution, and are not ideal for HDTVs.
sentences.chinese: 複合視頻接口僅是低分辨率的，不適合高清電視。

sentences.english: You can tell a travel club member right off.
sentences.chinese: 你可以立刻分辨出旅遊社的成員。

sentences.english: Don't eat of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫分辨善惡的知識樹的果實。

sentences.english: So if the wall is 9m wide, use 18m as the width to consider resolution.
sentences.chinese: 因此如果長城寬9米，那麼就用18米作爲分辨率。

sentences.english: People who cannot distinguish between colours are said to be colour-blind.
sentences.chinese: 不能分辨顏色的人被稱爲色盲。

sentences.english: This is because motion estimation is performed to sub-pixel resolution.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲運動估計執行到子像素分辨率。

sentences.english: Draw textured with overlaid lightmap resolution grid.
sentences.chinese: 繪製帶有覆蓋光照貼圖分辨率網格紋理。

sentences.english: In this paper, a digital method of superresolution or high-frequency reconstruction is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種超分辨處理或高頻重建的數字方法。

sentences.english: The large image is the highest-resolution version of the image.
sentences.chinese: 供下載的大圖爲最高分辨率版本。

sentences.english: The simulation of high-frequency multibeam sonar image is the main task in the dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 高分辨多波束聲納圖像的仿真是本文的主要任務。

definition: to distinguish (between different things)/to make distinctions clear
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to conclude/to determine/to come to a judgment
to sense/to perceive/to become aware of/to detect
to obscure/to confuse/to mix up/to blur/to mislead
